name: Face with Head-Bandage
baseMeaning: A yellow face with a bandage wrapped around its head, appearing injured.

contextMeanings.meaning: Having a physical injury, especially head-related.
Indicates emotional pain or feeling beat up by life.

platformNotes.note: Used for physical and emotional injury posts.
Common when sharing about accidents or hard times.

generationalNotes.note: Used both literally and for emotional wounds.
Common for expressing feeling hurt or beaten down.
